column2: Like most races those from Albion are no stranger to felling trees to use in construction.
Most Albion architecture is based around mud buildings with thatched roofing with wood reserved for their more grandiose buildings.
With a glut of wood available, common log cabins can be seen sprouting up amongst the common folk.
Albion lacks the technolgy to properly mine, so with crude pick axes they work on above ground seams of gold.
Albion lacks the technolgy to properly mine, so with crude pick axes they work on above ground seams of iron.
Albion lacks the technolgy to properly mine, so with crude pick axes they work on above ground seams of marble.
The wise elderly women of Albion, who know the old ways forage for herbs which will cure all manner of ills.
